claims: Documented the MCP/A2A layered interop model and Summit control/data plane mapping.
Established initial evidence scaffolding for the MCP/A2A mental model workstream.

decisions.decision: Adopt a layered interop model with A2A control-plane routing and MCP data-plane tool execution.
decisions.rationale: Keeps supervisor context compact while preserving governed tool execution in specialist agents.

findings.finding: Evidence artifacts for interop PR1 are staged in a deterministic layout.
